message: Content creation is one of the newest professions brought about by modern social media! Brands across the country are starting to partner with content creators for marketing deals and product promotions. What legal issues arise in these contexts?
Join Julian Sarafian, attorney and content creator, for Content Creator Law by a Content Creator, a members-only presentation being held on Friday, December 8, 2023 at 2:00 p.m. ET/11:00 a.m. PT.
message3: *Please note: This presentation is accredited for one hour of General MCLE Credit in California, North Carolina, and South Caroline. It has been submitted and is pending review for Minimum Continuing Legal Education credit by the State Bar of Texas Committee on MCLE in the amount of one credit hour.
If you want to earn CLE credit for your attendance at this webinar, you will need to upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to take advantage of this exclusive benefit.

message: Reminder: You are registered for Content Creator Law by a Content Creator on Friday, December 8, 2023 at 2:00 p.m. ET/11:00 a.m. PT.

message: Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation! You must complete your attendance verification to receive CLE credit. As a reminder, if you have a free Justia Connect membership, you must upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to receive CLE credit.
The steps below must be completed by 12:00 p.m. PT on Sunday, December 10, 2023 to receive credit.
number-list: Input the attendance verification code received during your presentation.
Follow the remaining prompts in the form to input all pertinent information and offer evaluation of the MCLE presentation.
Download your certificate, and you’re done!
message2: If you have any questions about verification, please contact Justia Support.
